data.oai_dc:dc: Geneotype data from samples collected along the Glenburn transect. Field number - individual, Site number - corresponds with Figure 1, Cline distance - distance along the transect and used in cline analysis, mtDNA - mtDNA identity as determined from RFLP, MS - Le=L. ewingii, Lp=L. paraewingi, Hyb=hybrid as determined from Structure analysis, YrCollected - year sample was collected, Le1-Le8 - genotype data from microsatellite loci.
